name: Damselfly
description:
Damselfly is a short visual novel following a navigator trying to balance her job working for a shady company with the trust of her close friends. The player can explore her relationship with these friends and decide whom to trust, whom to keep in the dark, and whom to have a deeper relationship with.

I wrote, programmed, and illustrated this over the course of 3 months and I hope you enjoy this prototype!
